package com.company;

public class Main {

    public static void main(String[] args) {
            int sum = 0;
            int x = 1;
            int y = 2;
            while (x <= 4000000) {
                if (x % 2 == 0)
                    sum += x;
                int z = x + y;
                x = y;
                y = z;
                System.out.println(sum);
            }
        }
    }
